Uses of Package
com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.animation

  • Packages that use com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.animation 
    Package Description
    com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.animation  
  • Classes in com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.animation used by com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.animation 
    Class and Description
    Animation 
    AnimationDef
    This class defines an animation, a set of key frames and the image set used.
    ImageSet
    This class splits a BufferedImage object into Sprites.
    ImageSetStore
    This class stores ImageSets based on their ids, allowing for easy retrieval via ImageSetStore.get(String) or ImageSetStore.get(String, ImageSet).
    PlayMode
    The play mode used by the Animation class.
